text:
Question 152) The packaging label of a cosmetic reports that the dissolution of its content, according to its specifications, yields 2.7 liters of this product ready for use. A person will be underwent aesthetic treatment in which he should take an immersion bath with this product in a bathtub with a capacity of 0.3 m3. To avoid overflowing, this bathtub will be filled in 80% of its capacity.
For this bath, the minimum number of packaging of this cosmetic is
A) 9.
B) 12.
C) 89.
D) 112.
E) 134.
